name: part_000
file: tmp_【 #らでん生誕祭2025 】初！生誕ライブ～ここで出会ったのもなにかのご縁～【儒烏風亭らでん #ReGLOSS 】 [f5QgEZjH53Y]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Waiting screen with celebratory artwork of hololive ReGLOSS members.
Performance of 'Our Bright Parade' starts on a virtual stage.
MC section where Raden greets the audience while the song continues in the background.
Continuation of the song 'Our Bright Parade' performance.

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade, let's shine!

subtitles.original: 呼び合う声を合図に
subtitles.english: With our voices calling out as the signal

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 探しにいく
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade, let's go searching

subtitles.original: スタートは何度だって
subtitles.english: We can start over as many times as it takes

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 皆さんこんにちは！儒烏風亭らでん生誕祭2025！
subtitles.english: Hello everyone! Juufuutei Raden's Birthday 2025!

subtitles.original:
Our Bright Parade
作詞・作曲・編曲：堀江晶太
subtitles.english:
Our Bright Parade
Lyrics, Comp, Arr: Shota Horie

subtitles.original: 始まりました！盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: It's started! Let's get excited!

subtitles.original: ただ 独り言綴った
subtitles.english: Just writing down my monologues

subtitles.original: ただ 始まりたくて走った
subtitles.english: Just wanting to start, I ran

subtitles.original: 遠く 暗がりに灯った
subtitles.english: Lit up in the distant darkness

subtitles.original: それは 眩しすぎた名前
subtitles.english: That was a name far too dazzling

subtitles.original: それは 優しすぎる想いで
subtitles.english: That's a memory far too kind

subtitles.original: もっと 近づきたくて手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: Reaching out, wanting to get closer

subtitles.original: 思いがけず結び合った
subtitles.english: We unexpectedly became tied together

subtitles.original: ほら 今 迷子は隣になった
subtitles.english: Look, now the lost child is right beside me

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade, let's shine!

subtitles.original: 悔しさも愛しさも連れておいで
subtitles.english: Bring both the frustration and the affection

subtitles.original: 風 夢 羽 飛び立てるさ
subtitles.english: Wind, dreams, wings, we can take flight

subtitles.original: ささやかな祈りは光 終わりなき兆し
subtitles.english: A modest prayer is light, an endless sign

subtitles.original: 君を見つけたこと 胸を張れるよ
subtitles.english: I can be proud of having found you
